t: Why Did My Porcelain Sink Crack?
s: October 11, 2019 - Cracks in porcelain sink bowls can happen for a number of reasons. Sudden extreme temperature changes, dropped items, shock or simply age can cause cracks in the surface. Sometimes they start as minor hairline cracks that you can barely see and eventually grow to major cracks through the sink.
